testing.caption:
✨ Welcome to Anime Garden! ✨

Discover & Request your favorite Anime.
Use the buttons below to explore more!

Commands:
/addpost - Admin only: Save an anime post with media, caption & buttons
/animelist - List saved anime posts
/search <name> - Search saved anime by name
/requestanime <name> - Request an anime (will be forwarded to group)
/viewrequests - View all anime requests
/users - View how many users have started the bot (admin only)
/broadcast - Broadcast a message to all users (admin only)
/cancel - Cancel current operation
